A comparison of results computed with CCD equations, using naive approach and intermediates. This works as a benchmark for the inclusion of Intermediates.
The system consist of 4 shells, and 4 hole states. 
I have used 201values of g, equally spaced, ranging from -1 to 1
Below are the reference energy and calculated correlation energies in following order
g, Reference energy, Naive CCD, Intermediate CCD
-1 3 -0.218577 -0.218577
-0.99 2.99 -0.214784 -0.214784
